pedia.name: BuMed
pedia.content:
The Bureau of Medicine, or BuMed, is the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]]'s medical branch, headed by the Seventh Space Lord, who was also the Surgeon General of the Star Kingdom of Manticore.

Among other institutions, it oversees the Bassingford Medical Center.

pedia.name: Grayson
pedia.content:
Grayson is the inhabited fifth planet of the [[Yeltsin's Star System]], and the capital world of the [[Protectorate of Grayson]].

Grayson
Location:

[[Yeltsin's Star System]]
Affiliation:

[[Protectorate of Grayson]]
Settled:

988 PD
Capital:

Austin City
Population:

~ 3 billion Plus 42 Sphinxian Treecats
Diameter:

12,484 km
Gravity:

1.17 G
Satellites:  


Star Geography

Grayson is located in the Yeltsin's Star System, 31 light years to the north east of the [[Manticore System]], over five hundred light years away from [[Earth]], and two days travel west of the Endicott System. 

It is the only habitable planet in its system, with a population of around four and a half billion humans around 1905 PD.  It orbited its star at a distance of about 13.5 light minutes. 

Planetary characteristics

The planet is not as large as Earth and had a blue-green color to it because of the massive amounts of chlorophyll. There are few deserts. Grayson has a high concentration of heavy metals, such as arsenic and cadmium. None of the native fauna and flora are edible to humans, and the water is too acidic to drink. Most of the metals are worth attracting interstellar trade.

pedia.name: Beowulf
pedia.content:
Beowulf is a planet in the Sigma Draconis System, the second oldest [[human]] colony and one of the oldest member worlds of the [[Solarian League]]. Beowulf is renowned for its scientists, especially in the fields of hyper physics, medicine, and applied genetics.

 

Beowulf
Location:

Sigma Draconis System
Affiliation:

[[Solarian League]]
[[Republic of Beowulf]]
Settled:  
Capital:

Columbia
Population:  
Diameter:  
Gravity:  
Satellites:

pedia.name: Republic of Beowulf
pedia.content:
The Republic of Beowulf is a star nation and a founding member of the [[Solarian League]]. It consisted of the Sigma Draconis System and its planets, most importantly [[Beowulf]], one of the first [[human]] colonies in outer space.

Republic of Beowulf
Form of Government Meritocratic republic
Home Planet [[Beowulf]]
Capital Columbia
Head of Government Chairman
Senior Military Commander Chief of Naval Operations
Executive Branch Board of Directors
Legislative Branch Chamber of Shareholders
Chamber of Professions
Military System-Defense Force
Marine Corps
Population 6 billion

pedia.name: House of Lords
pedia.content:
The House of Lords is one of the two legislative bodies of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]], and together with the [[House of Commons]] form the Star Kingdom's Parliament.

Its membership consists entirely of Peers of the Realm and aristocrats, who hold seats in the House for life. All peerages above the rank of Baron from the three original planets of the Star Kingdom held two seats in the Lords: one for the current holder of the peerage and another "cadet seat" for his or her heir. Also, peers of the realm who had more than one title of nobility were entitled to have as many as two seats (and votes) with their respective cadet seats in the House. "Life peers" (members of the nobility whose titles and dignities cannot be inherited) were excluded from the House of Lords.

In the event that a member of the House was unavailable for voting, he or she could allow a proxy to vote in his or her name, provided certain conditions and procedures were previously met.

No elections were held for the Lords; new members of the House were created by the Crown with the consent and approval of a majority of the House of Commons, thus giving the lower house a say in the composition of the upper house. However, the membership of the Lords could not be increased over 10% between any two general elections, and the Lords reserved the right to refuse to seat a newly-created peer of the realm.

The House of Lords was the senior branch of the Manticoran Parliament, as the Star Kingdom's Constitution mandated that the Prime Minister must be a member of the House and command a majority of its members to hold the office. In addition, the Lords held the "power of the purse", which meant that they alone could initiate any budget, tax or appropriation bill, as well as approve its final form, which included the power to override any amendments introduced by the Commons. However, with the fall of the High Ridge government, the Grantville government used its majority to introduce a transitional bill that over the course of 5 T-years would transfer its "power of the purse" to the Commons.

The presiding officer of the House of Lords is the Speaker, who is responsible for presiding the House's sessions and maintaining order between its members. Other members of the House staff included the Sergeant-at-Arms.

pedia.name: House of Commons
pedia.content:
The House of Commons is one of the chambers of the Parliament of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]], together with the [[House of Lords]].

Unlike the aristocratic and hereditary House of Lords, the House of Commons is composed of Members of Parliament (MPs) elected by and from the commoner population of the Star Kingdom, thus giving the non-aristocratic majority of the Crown's subjects a say in the government. In fact, the Star Kingdom's Constitution specifically forbade Peers of the Realm to stand for election to the Commons, unless they had previously resigned their titles of nobility.

For elections to the Commons, the planets of the Star Kingdom are divided into constituencies known as "boroughs", with one MP representing each borough.

General elections to the House of Commons take place at least once every four Manticoran years, and could only be delayed during times of war. In the event that a Member of Parliament resigned his or her seat before the following general election, a special by-election was called in his or her borough to replace the resigning MP.

While the Prime Minister is required to come from the Lords and command a majority in said House, other members of the Cabinet could come from the Commons, and in general any Prime Minister tried to cultivate a good relationship with the lower house - and through the Commons, with the general population of the Star Kingdom.

The Commons can initiate legislation and veto bills passed by the Lords, but its legislative powers on matters of budget and appropriations are limited under the Star Kingdom's Constitution, as it conferred to the House of Lords exclusive powers of initiation and final approval of finance bills. Conversely, the Commons exerted influence in the House of Lords by the constitutional requirement that any newly-created peerage must be approved by the lower house. Additionally, the revoking of a peerage could only occur with the approval of the Commons.

The House of Lords was the senior branch of the Manticoran Parliament, as the Star Kingdom's Constitution mandated that the Prime Minister must be a member of the House and command a majority of its members to hold the office. In addition, the Lords held the "power of the purse", which meant that they alone could initiate any budget, tax or appropriation bill, as well as approve its final form, which included the power to override any amendments introduced by the Commons. However, with the fall of the High Ridge government, the Grantville government used its majority to introduce a transitional bill that over the course of 5 T-years would transfer its "power of the purse" to the Commons.

pedia.name: AL
pedia.content:
The After Landing or AL designation is the official time reckoning in the Star Kingdom of Manticore, although most people used the [[PD]] system in day-to-day life.

An AL date described how many Manticoran years (with one Manticore year equalling 1.7333 T-years) ago the first shuttle from the colony ship Jason landed on the planet [[Manticore]]. The Year 0 AL were the first 1.7333 T-years after March 1416 PD.

pedia.name: PD
pedia.content:
The term Post Diaspora (PD for short) is the common interstellar era description of the [[humans]] who colonized the Galaxy during the Diaspora of Man. The Diaspora began in the year 2103 CE, when first human colonisation ship, Prometheus, left [[Earth]].

The term Ante Diaspora (AD) was used for the preceding era.

(see also [[AL]])

pedia.name: Grand Alliance
pedia.content:
The Grand Alliance is a coalition of star nations opposed to the [[Solarian League]], created in the year 1922 PD. Its creation was the result of the revelation that many of the major political and military events in the recent history of these nations had been influenced by the enigmatic [[Mesan Alignment]] in order to take over the colonized universe.

Members

Known star nations participating in the Grand Alliance were:

  • [[Protectorate of Grayson]]
  • [[Republic of Beowulf]]
  • [[Republic of Haven]]
  • [[Star Empire of Manticore]]

The [[human]] star nations of the Grand Alliance were supported by the [[treecat]]s of Sphinx, a sentient species protected by the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]]. 

The [[Kingdom of Torch]]'s relationship to the Grand Alliance was unknown, though probably friendly. In addition, both the [[Republic of Erewhon]] and the [[Solarian League]]'s Maya Sector were cautiously cordial towards it, although the latter found it politically prudent to keep friendly ties unofficial.

Although the [[Andermani Empire]] was a member of the previous Manticoran Alliance, on the advice of Honor Harrington and [[Queen Elizabeth III]], it chose not to join the Grand Alliance to leave open the potential for independent action against the [[Mesan Alignment]].

pedia.name: Republic of Erewhon
pedia.content:
The Republic of Erewhon is a single-system star nation with the planet [[Erewhon]] as its capital. It was allied with the [[Solarian League]] and, like Manticore, in possession of a wormhole junction, the Erewhon Wormhole Junction. Its terminus in the Terra Haute System was 25 light-years away from the Hennesy Terminus of the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]].

Republic of Erewhon
Form of Government Oligarchic Republic
Official language Standard English
Home Planet [[Erewhon]]
Capital Maytag
Head of State President
Head of Government Unofficial quadrumvirate of families' heads
Executive Branch Cabinet
Military Erewhon Navy
Erewhon Army


Star Geography

The [[Republic of Haven]] is located to the galactic north, the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]] to the west, and the Phoenix Cluster to the south-east.

pedia.name: Talbott Quadrant
pedia.content:
The Talbott Quadrant is the designation for the systems of the Talbott Cluster that have elected to join the [[Star Empire of Manticore]] following the discovery of the Lynx Terminus and the ratification of the Constitution of the Talbott Quadrant in the Constitutional Convention of 1921 PD.

The Quadrant is the primary responsibility of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]]'s Talbott Station and its Tenth Fleet. 

Star Geography

The Talbott Quadrant is composed of sixteen systems of the Talbott Cluster which agreed to join the Star Empire of Manticore under the terms established at the Talbott Constitutional Convention. As of 1921 PD, it included all the systems of the Cluster with the exception of New Tuscany and Lynx System. New Tuscany refused to join. The Lynx System was admitted as part of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]].

Member systems

  • Celebrant System – Celebrant
  • Dresden System – Dresden
  • Mainwaring System
  • Marian System
  • Montana System – Montana
  • Nuncio System – Pontifex and Basilica
  • Pequod System
  • Prairie System
  • Redoubt System
  • Rembrandt System – Rembrandt
  • San Miguel System
  • Scarlet System
  • Spindle System – Flax, capital world
  • Split System – Kornati
  • Talbott System
  • Tillerman System

Government

As a member of the Star Empire of Manticore, the head of state of the Talbott Quadrant is the Manticoran monarch. In 1922 PD, [[Queen Elizabeth III]], as "Empress Elizabeth I of the Star Empire of Manticore", was the Quadrant's formal head of state.

pedia.name: Medusa
pedia.content:
Medusa is the sole inhabitable planet of the [[Basilisk System]] and homeworld of the [[Medusan]]s. It is located near the Basilisk Terminus of the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]], which brings a lot of traffic to the system and the planet.

Medusa
Location:

[[Basilisk System]]
Affiliation:

[[Star Empire of Manticore]]
Settled:

homeworld of the Medusans
Capital:

Resident Commissioner's compound
Population:

~700 million Medusans
Diameter:  
Gravity:

.85 G
Satellites:

pedia.name: Mesan Alignment
pedia.content:
The Mesan Alignment was a covert organization whose main goal was the purposeful improvement of the human species though genetic manipulation. It used the Mesan government, Manpower Incorporated, and assorted other organizations as fronts for its activities, ultimately intended to giving it control over humanity.

In the 20th Century PD, it was headed by Albrecht Detweiler and his cloned "sons".

pedia.name: Manticore
pedia.content:
Manticore, officially Manticore A-III, is the third planet of the [[Manticore System]] and the capital world of the [[Star Kingdom]] and [[Star Empire of Manticore]].

Manticore A-III
Location:

[[Manticore System]]
Affiliation:

[[Star Empire of Manticore]]
Settled:

1416 PD
Capital:

Landing
Population:

1.5 billion
Diameter:

12,992 km
Gravity:

1.01 G
Satellites:

1 (Thorson)

pedia.name: Monarch
pedia.content:
The King or Queen of Manticore was the head of state and government of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]]. The throne was in the hands of the House of Winton since Roger Winton, President and CEO of Manticore Colony, Ltd., was crowned King in 1485 PD

As in ancient Great Britain, the office of the Monarch was officially known as the "Crown". 

In 1921 PD, the Manticoran kingdom was transformed into a Star Empire, so future monarchs would be known as Emperor or Empress of Manticore. (see [[Star Empire of Manticore]])

pedia.name: First Space Lord
pedia.content: The First Space Lord is a member of the [[Manticoran Admiralty]] and the senior uniformed officer of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]].

pedia.name: Republic of Sidemore
pedia.content:
The Republic of Sidemore is an independent star nation in the Marsh System on the edge of the [[Silesian Confederacy]].

The capital of the Republic is Sidemore, the sole habitable planet of Marsh. 

In recognition of Captain Honor Harrington's contribution to restoring their freedom following the occupation of Sidemore and Marsh by Andre Warnecke and his fugitive followers, the Sidemorians maintained a treaty relationship with the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]], and later began expanding their trade into Silesia.

The Republic's armed space forces are called the Sidemore Navy.

In 1920 PD, following the partitioning and annexation of Silesia by the [[Andermani Empire]] and the Star Kingdom, the Republic remained an independent star nation and ally of the [[Star Empire of Manticore]].

pedia.name: Star Kingdom of Manticore
pedia.content:
The Star Kingdom of Manticore was a [[star nation]], an interstellar state consisting of the [[[Manticore System]]] and all or part of the seven systems accessible through the [[[Manticore Wormhole Junction]]].

Star Geography

The binary [[Manticore System]] was located 512 light-years to the Galactic north of the [[Sol System]] and [[Earth]]. It contained three habitable planets: the capital planet of [[Manticore]], [[Sphinx]], and [[Gryphon]]. 

For most of its history, the Star Kingdom was a single-system nation. However, from the 19th Century PD onwards it began to incorporate new systems for strategic reasons, mostly to control the termini of the Manticore Wormhole Junction, and eventually at the request of those systems' own populations and governments.

Star Kingdom of Manticore
Form of Government Constitutional Monarchy
Official language Standard English
Home Planet [[Manticore]]
Capital Landing
Head of State [[Monarch]]
Head of Government [[Monarch]] (formal)

[[Prime Minister]] (customary)
Senior Military Commander [[First Space Lord]]
Executive Branch Royal Council
Legislative Branch Parliament
  • [[House of Lords]]
  • [[House of Commons]]
Military [[Royal Manticoran Navy]]
[[Royal Manticoran Army]]
[[Royal Manticoran Marine Corps]]
[[Talbott Quadrant Guard]]
Founded 1485 PD
Currency Manticoran dollar

pedia.name: Kingdom of Torch
pedia.content:
The Kingdom of Torch is an independent star nation established by former Manpower slaves on the planet [[Torch]], formerly known as Congo, in the year 1919 PD.

Kingdom of Torch
Form of Government Monarchy (in organization)
Official language English
Home Planet [[Torch]]
Capital Beacon
Head of State Queen
Head of Government Prime Minister
Executive Branch Cabinet
Military Royal Torch Navy
Royal Torch Army
Founded 1919 PD
Population 4.25 mln

Star Geography

The Kingdom encompassed the [[Congo System]], which lay between the [[Republic of Erewhon]], the [[Solarian League]], and the [[Republic of Haven]]. The nearby Congo Wormhole Junction was believed to have no fewer than three termini. 

In 1921 PD the junction was surveyed by Dr. Jordin Kare and Dr. Richard Wix and their team aboard the Manticoran survey vessel Harvest Joy. The survey mission located the terminus and determined that it was a wormhole bridge.

pedia.name: Manticore Wormhole Junction
pedia.content:
The Manticore Wormhole Junction is a [[wormhole junction]] whose central node was in the [[Manticore System]].



Astrophysics

That node is an invisible sphere in space, a light-second in diameter, and has a total of seven known external termini as of 1921 PD. It lay 7 light-hours from Manticore-A. 

Known termini

The Manticore Terminus was located in the Manticore-A System itself and was the central node of the Junction. All traffic necessarily passed through that node regardless of its destination.

  • Basilisk Terminus – 210 ly to Galactic North of Manticore – located near the [[Basilisk System]].
  • Beowulf Terminus – 475 ly to the Galactic South – located near the Sigma Draconis System (co-managed with [[Beowulf]], a member of the [[Solarian League]])
  • Gregor Terminus – 180 ly to the Galactic Northwest – located near the Gregor Binary System (since 1869 PD the system was partially controlled by the [[Anderman Empire]]).
  • Hennesy Terminus – 712 ly to the Galactic Southeast – located in the Phoenix Cluster
  • Lynx Terminus – 612 ly to the Galactic Southwest – located in the Talbott Cluster (and later the Talbott Quadrant.)
  • Matapan Terminus – 472 ly to the Galactic West – located near the Matapan System
  • Trevor's Star Terminus – 210 ly to the Galactic Northeast - located near the [[Trevor's Star System]]

pedia.name: Treecat
pedia.content: Treecat is the common name of the native sentient species of the planet [[Sphinx]] in the [[Manticore System]]. They are often referred to by the shortened version, 'cats, and referred to themselves as The People.

pedia.name: BuTrain
pedia.content:
The Bureau of Training, also called BuTrain, is the department of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]] responsible for the education and training of officers and crewmen. As such, it organized and maintained the [[Saganami Island Naval Academy]] and other training facilities.

It is led by the Sixth Space Lord, a position held by Vice Admiral Lord Sir Frederick Ormskirk, Earl of Tanith Hill in the 1910s PD.

pedia.name: San Martin
pedia.content:
San Martin is the only habitable planet in the [[Trevor's Star System]], and home to the [[Republic of San Martin]], an independent star nation that eventually became part of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]].

San Martin is a very dense world, with a gravity 2.7 times that of Earth. The planet is one of the heaviest-gravity worlds that man had ever settled. Its sea-level air pressure is high enough to produce near-toxic concentrations of carbon dioxide and nitrogen. This fact limits the population to mountain ranges, plateaus, and other high altitude locations.

San Martin
Location:

[[Trevor's Star System]]
Affiliation:

[[Star Empire of Manticore]]
Settled:  
Capital:

Ciudad San Marcos
Population:  
Diameter:  
Gravity:

2.7 G
Satellites:

pedia.name: BuPlan
pedia.content:
The Bureau of Planning is a department of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]]. Headed by the Second Space Lord, it is the Manticoran equivalent of the [[Republic of Haven Navy]]'s institution of the same name. 

Departments

  • [[Office of Naval Intelligence]] (ONI)

Directors

  • Vice Admiral Patricia Givens (1905-1915 PD)
  • Admiral Francis Jurgensen (1915-1919 PD)
  • Admiral Patricia Givens (1920 PD - )

pedia.name: Medusan
pedia.content: The Medusans are the native sentient species of the planet [[Medusa]] in the [[Basilisk System]].

pedia.name: Royal Manticoran Marine Corps
pedia.content:
The Royal Manticoran Marine Corps, or RMMC, are the "amphibious" military force of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]], mostly serving aboard [[Royal Manticoran Navy]] vessels.

The motto of the RMMC is Possimus Perficio ("Can Do").

The RMMC are stationed on planets, stations, and vessels with duties such as security. Marines take part in boarding and landing parties. During Naval combat, Marines man the ship's weapon and defensive stations as well as assist in damage control.  The RMMC's main "boot camp" is not located on Saganami Island, but on the planet Gryphon, taking advantage of the harsh climate for training.

pedia.name: Royal Manticoran Navy
pedia.content:
The Royal Manticoran Navy, or RMN, is the main military force for the Star Kingdom and [[Star Empire of Manticore]].

Ships of the RMN use the prefix HMS (His/Her Majesty's Ship).

Its officers are trained at [[Saganami Island Naval Academy]].

The RMN's motto is Fortitudo, Fidelitas, Decus (Courage, Loyalty, Honor).

The official motto of the RMN was "The Tradition Lives."

pedia.name: Silesian Confederacy
pedia.content:
The Silesian Confederacy is a multi-system star nation to the far galactic north of the [[Solarian League]].

Silesian Confederacy
Form of Government Confederation
Home Planet [[Silesia]]
Head of Government Prime Minister
Executive Branch Cabinet
Sector Governors
System Governors
Military Silesian Confederate Navy
Silesian Army


Star Geography

The Confederacy, consisting of around sixty inhabited star systems, divided into nine sectors, is bordered by the [[Anderman Empire]] and [[Sidemore Republic]] to the galactic southwest, and the [[Basilisk System]] to the northeast. 

It is roughly 105 ly across and has a volume of around 600,000 cubic lightyears.

pedia.name: Solarian-Manticoran War
pedia.content:
The Solarian-Manticoran War (1921 - 1923 PD) was an undeclared war fought between the Solarian League and the Star Empire of Manticore. 

The war was referred to as the Manticoran Crisis by those in the Solarian League.

pedia.name: Prime Minister of the Star Kingdom of Manticore
pedia.content:
The Prime Minister is the head of the Star Kingdom of Manticore's government. He or she is appointed by the monarch and needed the support of a majority in parliament to get elected. Prime Ministers are required to be seated members of the House of Lords.

In 1900 PD, Lord Allen Summervale, Duke of Cromarty, was the Prime Minister, and had been for many years.  After he died in a Masadan assassination attempt on [[Queen Elizabeth III]] and [[Protector Benjamin IX]], Michael Janvier, Baron High Ridge, took over against the expressed wish of the Queen. He was himself replaced by William Alexander five years later when the [[Second Havenite-Manticoran War]] began and the failure of the High Ridge government became obvious. 

After the creation of the [[Star Empire of Manticore]], the Prime Minister's authority remained restricted to the Old Star Kingdom, while the [[Talbott Quadrant]] was governed by its own prime minister. 

Prime Ministers

  • Davis Harper, Duke of Burgundy – around 1530 PD
  • Julian Mulholland, Baron of Harwich - 1543 PD
  • Margo Thackeray – around 1752 PD
  • Casper O'Grady, Earl of Mortenson – around 1850 PD
  • Leonard Shumate, Earl of Thompson – around 1852 PD
  • Allen Summervale, Duke Cromarty – 1857-1915 PD (with three interruptions)
  • Michael Janvier, Baron High Ridge – 1915-1920 PD
  • William Alexander, Baron Grantville – 1920 PD-

pedia.name: Republic of Haven Marine Corps
pedia.content: The Republic of Haven Marine Corps, temporarily known as the People’s Marines (PM), are the "amphibious" military force of the [[Republic of Haven]].

pedia.name: Protectorate of Grayson
pedia.content:
The Protectorate of Grayson is a star nation encompassing the [[Yeltsin's Star System]] and its inhabited planet, also called [[Grayson]].

Protectorate of Grayson
Form of Government Feudal Monarchy
Official language Standard English
Home Planet [[Grayson]]
Capital Austin City
Head of State [[Protector]]
Head of Government Chancellor
Senior Military Commander High Admiral
Executive Branch Protector's Council
Legislative Branch Great Conclave
Steadholders
Steaders
Military [[Grayson Space Navy]]
[[Grayson Army]]
[[Grayson Space Marine Corps]]
Grayson Space Guard (former)
Founded 988 PD
Population ~3 billion (1920 PD) plus 42 Sphinxian [[Treecat]]s
Currency Grayson austin

pedia.name: Battle of Sol
pedia.content:
The Battle of Sol was the final battle of the [[Solarian-Manticoran War]], fought in January 1923 PD in humanity's home system of Sol ([[Sol System]]). It brought an end to the war, and resulted in unprecedented political and socio-economic changes for the [[Solarian League]].

Battle of Sol
 
Conflict [[Solarian-Manticoran War]]
Date January 1923 PD
Place [[Sol System]]
Result Alliance victory
Combatants

[[Grand Alliance]] Grand Fleet

[[Solarian League Navy]]
Commanders

Fleet Adm. Kingsford
Adm. Haeckle, CO NSG

  • BCs scuttled
  • CA/CLs scuttled
  • DDs scuttled
  • missile pods scuttled

pedia.name: Basilisk System
pedia.content:
The Basilisk System is a star system in the galactic north of the [[Manticore System]], containing a terminus of the Manticore Wormhole Junction.


Basilisk is bordered by the [[Republic of Haven]] to the east, the [[Silesian Confederacy]] to the west. [[Manticore]] is 210 light years to the south.

The system consists of a G5 star and has a single habitable planet, [[Medusa]], which orbits it at a distance of about seven light minutes.

pedia.name: Sol System
pedia.content:
The Sol System is a G2 star system in the [[Solarian League]]. As its third planet, [[Earth]], was the original homeworld of the [[human]] race, Sol was the League's capital system, as well as one of the most populated and industrialized ones.

In 1900 PD, the Sol System's gross system product was the highest of all human systems. 

In January 1923 PD, the [[Battle of Sol]] saw the defeat of the system defenses and the destruction of almost all its extensive orbital industry by the [[Grand Alliance]].

pedia.name: Gryphon
pedia.content:
Gryphon, also known as Manticore B-IV, is the third habitable planet located in the [[Manticore System]], orbiting its secondary star. It was the last planet settled by the Manticoran colonists, being the least hospitable one.

Gryphon
(Manticore B-IV)
Location:

[[Manticore System]]
Affiliation:

[[Star Empire of Manticore]]
Settled:  
Capital:  
Population:

600 million
Diameter:

11,878 km
Gravity:

1.05 G
Satellites:

pedia.name: Manticore System
pedia.content:
The Manticore System is a binary star system and the home system of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]]. The kingdom's capital planet, [[Manticore]], is located in the system, as are the planets [[Sphinx]] and [[Gryphon]], and the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]].

It is located 512 light-years from [[Earth]].

All planets in the system were named after creatures from Earth mythology.

Star Geography

Manticore-A chart

Manticore-A

(G0 star)

  • Salamander (Manticore-A I)
  • Phoenix (Manticore-A II)
  • [[Manticore]] (Manticore A III, inhabitable, capital)
    • Thorson (Moon)
  • [[Sphinx]] (Manticore-A IV, inhabitable, [[treecat]] homeworld)
    • Perseus (moon)
    • Bellerophon (moon)
  • Draco (Manticore-A V, gas giant)
  • Roc (Manticore-A VI, gas giant)
  • Wyvern (Manticore-A VII, gas giant)

Manticore-B chart

Manticore-B

(G2 star)

  • Erinye (Manticore-B I)
  • Gorgon (Manticore-B II)
  • Aphrodite (Manticore-B III)
  • Damocles (Manticore-B IV)
  • [[Gryphon]] (Manticore-B V, inhabitable)
    • Egg (moon)
— Unicorn Belt
— Nibelung Belt
  • Titan (Manticore-B VI)
— Gorgon Belt
  • Fenris (Manticore-B VII, gas giant) 

Military

The Manticore System is home to several fleets of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]]:

  • [[Home Fleet]] – permanently stationed in the Manticore System, usually near Manticore itself

Facilities

The RMN's main shipyards, HMSS Hephaestus and HMSS Vulcan, were both located in this system, as was HMSS Weyland, the main naval research station. All three were destroyed in 1922 PD by the Mesan Operation Oyster Bay.

pedia.name: Royal Manticoran Army
pedia.content:
The Royal Manticoran Army (or RMA) is the primary ground combat branch of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]]'s armed forces.

The Army's main mission is to fight enemy ground forces, secure and maintain control of planetary surfaces, and maintain the peace against uprisings or unrest when called to do so by the Government. For that mission, the Army is equipped with tanks and other armored vehicles, sting ships, artillery, and power armor. The Army also maintains the Royal Manticoran Army Atmospheric Command, which could effectively be thought of as the Royal Manticoran Air Force.

As during peacetime the bulk of the military needs of the Star Kingdom are met by the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]] and the [[Royal Manticoran Marine Corps]], the Army is usually severely downsized, and its activity focused upon improving its capabilities and training for the event of a war. In wartime, however, the Army is greatly expanded to meet the needs of ground troops to hold and secure enemy territory following initial assaults by the Marines.

pedia.name: Home Fleet
pedia.content:
Home Fleet may refer to:

  • the Manticoran Home Fleet, tasked with guarding the [[Manticore System]] and reinforce wormhole termini pickets.
  • the Havenite Capital Fleet, tasked with guarding the [[Haven System]].
  • the Grayson Home Fleet, tasked with guarding the [[Yeltsin's Star System]].
  • the Andermani Home Fleet, tasked with guarding the [[New Berlin System]].

pedia.name: Queen Elizabeth III
pedia.content: Elizabeth III, Queen and Empress of Manticore, was the sixteenth reigning monarch of the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]] and the first reigning monarch of the [[Star Empire of Manticore]].

pedia.name: Advanced Tactical Course
pedia.content:
The Advanced Tactical Course is a course at the Royal Manticoran Naval Academy on Saganami Island (See [[Saganami Island Naval Academy]]) that is taken so that officers can command larger vessels such as light cruisers.

Overview

The course is housed in the Advanced Tactical Course building, and is informally known as The Crusher. Very few officers are given the opportunity to wear the White Command Beret of a hyper-capable starship commander prior to taking the ATC. Failing to pass the ATC nearly always guaranteed that the officer would never again be assigned a hyper-capable command. 

The ATC was created in the late 1680s PD by Commodore Ellen D'Orville.

pedia.name: Trevor's Star System
pedia.content:
The Trevor's Star System was a star system in the inner influence sphere of the [[Republic of Haven]]. It was the location of the a terminus of the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]], which was a cause of concern for both [[Manticore]] and Haven, and eventualy became part of the Star Kingdom.

Star geography

Trevor's Star was located to the galactic east of the Star Kingdom of Manticore, in the territory of the expanded People's Republic of Haven. It was orbited by one inhabited planet named [[San Martin]].

pedia.name: Republic of Haven Navy
pedia.content:
The Republic of Haven Navy (RHN) is the main military force for the [[Republic of Haven]]. Its officers are trained at the Republic of Haven Naval Academy, and its ships use the prefix RHNS (Republic of Haven Navy Ship). During the time of the People's Republic, the RHN was commonly known as the People's Navy (PN), and its ships used the prefix PNS (People's Navy Ship).

Organization

Departments

  • Special Operations
  • Bureau of Planning
    • Office of Operational Research
      • Office of Naval Intelligence

Independent formations

Fleets

  • Capital Fleet (PN)
  • Twelfth Fleet (PN)
  • First Fleet (RHN)
  • Second Fleet (RHN)
  • Fifth Fleet (RHN)

pedia.tags: planet, earth, solarian, sol, sol system, human
pedia.name: Earth
pedia.content:
Earth, also known as Terra or Old Earth, is the third planet of the [[Sol System]], the homeworld of humanity, and the capital of the [[Solarian League]].

Earth
Location:

[[Sol System]]
Affiliation:

[[Solarian League]]
Settled:

[ homeworld ]
Capital:

Chicago
Population:

Several billion
Diameter:

12,742 km
Gravity:

1.0 G
Satellites:

1 (Luna)

pedia.name: Office of Naval Intelligence
pedia.content:
The Office of Naval Intelligence, or ONI, is a department of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]] charged with retrieving and using information on other star nations, including vessels, personnel, and technology.

It is under the supervision of the Bureau of Planning ([[BuPlan]]), thus reporting to the Second Space Lord.

pedia.name: Republic of San Martin
pedia.content:
The Republic of San Martin is a small, single system star nation, centered on the planet [[San Martin]] in the [[Trevor's Star System]]

Population

San Martin's population is almost completely composed of genetically engineered humans modified for high gravity worlds. The primary language is Spanish. Most settlement are located on the mountaintops and high mesas.

(See [[San Martin]])

pedia.name: Manticoran Admiralty
pedia.content:
The Admiralty is the authority in the [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]] responsible for the command of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]].

The Lords of Admiralty were civilian officials who administered the Navy through seven Space Lords, active senior RMN officers. The Lords were subordinated to the Minister of War.

The main offices are located in the Admiralty Building in the capital city of Landing. 

Lords of the Admiralty

  • First Lord of the Admiralty – the civilian head of the Royal Manticoran Navy, handling the overall coordination of naval policy as directed by the Cabinet
  • Second Lord of the Admiralty – responsible for the budgetary and fiscal management
  • Third Lord of the Admiralty – responsible for health and manpower

Space Lords

  • [[First Space Lord]] - the senior active-duty officer in the Royal Manticoran Navy, responsible for overall strategic direction, force structure management and deployment; directly under the First Space Lord's direction were the Type Commanders - each a full or fleet admiral charged with the maintenance and training of a specific class of naval vessel - and the Strategy Board.
  • Second Space Lord - handled operational and tactical planning and is the head of the Office of Naval Intelligence and headed the Bureau of Planning ([[BuPlan]]); probably had also some power with Criminal Investigation Division supervision.
  • Third Space Lord - oversaw construction and maintenance of warships in accordance with directions from the Second Lord of Admiralty as a head of the Bureau of Ships (BuShips).
  • Fourth Space Lord - responsible for research and development of new systems for the Navy as a Head of the Bureau of Weapons ([[BuWeaps]]).
  • Fifth Space Lord - managed recruitment and manpower and oversaw transfers and placement of naval personnel as a Head of the Bureau of Personnel ([[BuPers]]).
  • Sixth Space Lord - as a Head of the Bureau of Training ([[BuTrain]]) was responsible for the training and education of naval personnel in accordance with the Third Lord of Admiralty and the Fifth Space Lord.
  • Seventh Space Lord - as a Head of the Medical Bureau ([[BuMed]]) was in charge of the health and medical treatment of all Navy personnel and administered Naval Hospitals.

pedia.name: Wormhole Junction
pedia.content:
A wormhole junction is a stable gravitic anomaly, a flaw in normal space providing access via hyper-space between widely separated points. It consists of a central wormhole, the nexus, and its associated termini.

The termini are sometimes hundreds of light years away from the central nexus and from each other. Travel through the wormhole by hyper-capable ships is possible and allowed rapid travel to places that otherwise might take weeks, months, or even years to reach. Ships could travel from the nexus to any terminus, and from a terminus to the nexus, but direct travel between termini is impossible.

When a ship enters a junction, it actually ceases to exist in the normal space-time continuum for an instant.

The concept of wormhole junctions was first theorized by Dr. Shigematsu Radhakrishnan.

pedia.name: Republic of Haven Army
pedia.content: The Republic of Haven Army, temporarily known as the People's Army, is the primary ground combat branch of the [[Republic of Haven]]'s armed forces.

pedia.name: Saganami Island Naval Academy
pedia.content:
The Royal Manticoran Naval Academy, also known as the Saganami Island Academy, is the Royal Manticoran Navy's officer school, located on Saganami Island on the planet [[Manticore]].

The commander of the RMNA is the Commandant, who usually presents the Last View Address to graduates.

The motto of the Saganami Island Naval Academy is "In War: Resolution. In Defeat: Defiance. In Victory: Magnanimity. In Peace: Goodwill." 

Courses (of note)

  • [[Advanced Tactical Course]] – held at the Advanced Tactical Course building
  • Commanding Officer's Course
  • Fourth Form Tactics
  • Introductory Tactics – first-year course

pedia.name: Republic of Haven
pedia.content:
The Republic of Haven, known as the People's Republic of Haven while governed by the Legislaturalists and the Committee of Public Safety (1700-1915 PD), is a multi-system star nation surrounded by many one-system independent nations.

The demonym "Havenite" is used to describe any person, object or concept associated with the Republic. During the period when Haven was known as the People's Republic of Haven (and on occasion thereafter), the informal and somewhat pejorative term "Peep" was also used.

Republic of Haven
Form of Government Republic
Official language Standard English
Home Planet [[Haven]]
Capital Nouveau Paris
Head of State President
Senior Military Commander Chief of Naval Operations
Executive Branch Cabinet
Legislative Branch Congress
(Senate and House of Representatives)
Military [[Republic of Haven Army]]
[[Republic of Haven Marine Corps]]
[[Republic of Haven Navy]]
Founded 1915 PD
(reestablishment after overthrow of the People's Republic of Haven)
Currency Havenite credit


Star Geography

The capital of the Republic is Nouveau Paris on the planet [[Haven]] in the [[Haven System]]. The [[Basilisk System]], home of one of the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]] termini, is to the 'west' of Haven, along with the [[Silesian Confederacy]] and the [[Anderman Empire]]. The [[Star Kingdom of Manticore]] is to the 'southwest', and the [[Republic of Erewhon]] with its Erewhon Wormhole Junction to the 'south'. By the time of the [First Havenite-Manticoran War]] the Republic of Haven included some 300 star systems. By the time of the [[Second Havenite-Manticoran War]], Haven had more than 75 inhabited worlds.

Member Systems

  • [[Haven System]] – Capital system of the Republic, home of the planet [[Haven]]
  • [[Cerberus System]] – Location of the prison planet [[Hades]]

pedia.name: Human
pedia.content:
Humans are a sentient species from the planet [[Earth]] in the [[Sol System]] and the predominant race in the known part of the Milky Way galaxy.

[[Treecats]] commonly referred to them as "two-legs". 

Humans are a species of bipedal primates in the family Hominidae (taxonomically Homo sapiens, Latin for "wise human" or "knowing human").

Genetic alterations

The DNA-based genetic code of the human species could be altered in a number of ways commonly refered to as genetic engineering. Once humans had found out how to achieve this, a number of genetic alterations on humans like the Meyerdahl First Wave and the Winton modification were developed to encrease physical strength or mental capabilities. 

The Prolong Treatment greatly encreased the life span of many humans in the Post Diaspora ([[PD]]) era, from around 100 to more than 200 T-years.

pedia.name: Protector
pedia.content:
The Protector is the hereditary ruler of the Protectorate of Grayson and formal head of the Church of Humanity Unchained.

The symbol of the Protector is a sword and bible; his office is known as the "Sword"

List of known Protectors

  • Oliver I
  • Benjamin II
  • Oliver IV
  • Bernard III
  • Cyrus I "the Weak"
  • John II ( - 1337 PD)
  • Benjamin IV "the Great" (1337 - 1397 PD)
  • Caleb ( - 1418 PD)
  • Thomas II "the Usurper" (1418 - 1424 PD)
  • Bernard V (1424 - )
  • Bernard VI (1569 PD - )
  • Peter
  • Benjamin VII ( - 1655 PD)
  • Adrian (1655 - 1681 PD)
  • Bernard VII (~1704 PD)
  • Michael II ( - 1753 PD)
  • Robert I (1753 - 1766 PD)
  • Robert II (1766 PD - )
  • Benjamin IX (1898 PD – )

pedia.name: Sphinx
pedia.content:
Sphinx, also called Manticore A-IV, is one of the three inhabited planets of the [[Manticore System]], and the homeworld of the [[treecats]]. It orbits the system's primary star along with the planet [[Manticore]].

Sphinx
(Manticore A-IV)
Location:

[[Manticore System]]
Affiliation:

[[Star Empire of Manticore]]
Settled:

15th Century PD
Capital:

Yawata Crossing (original)
Tillingham
Population:

1.2 billion humans
~ 12 million treecats
Diameter:

13,906 km
Gravity:

1.35 G
Satellites:

Perseus
Bellerophon

pedia.name: Solarian League
pedia.content:
The Solarian League was the largest, wealthiest, and most powerful star nation in existence in the 20th Century PD, consisting of [[Earth]] itself and thousands of colonies surrounding the [[Sol System]].

The term "Solly" is often used to describe persons, objects or concepts associated with the League.

Solarian League
Form of Government Confederation
Official language Standard English
Home Planet [[Earth]]
Capital Chicago
Head of State President of the League
Head of Government Prime Minister
Senior Military Commander Chief of Naval Operations
Executive Branch Executive Council
Legislative Branch League Assembly
Military Frontier Forces
Intervention battalion
Solarian Gendarmerie
[[Solarian League Marine Corps]]
[[Solarian League Navy]]
Founded 1165 PD
 


Star geography

With over 2,000 member and protected worlds in the 20th Century PD, the Solarian League extended in a radius of about 100 light years around the [[Sol System]].


Government

The Solarian League acts as a confederation. The League Assembly is the legislative branch of its government, while the Executive Council, as the name implied, is the executive branch. All members were given equal representation, and every member had veto power.

 

Territory

Members

There are 1,784 planets that hold League membership, spread over the core systems, also called the Old League, and the Shell. 

The inner systems, or Core worlds, were the first hundred or so colonies settled from Earth and many of them had populations larger than ten billion.

Protectorates

The Solarian League possesses more than 200 protectorates. They are former Verge worlds who have generally come under administration of the Office of Frontier Security. Technically protectorates aren't member states, thus - part of the League territory.

pedia.name: Andermani Empire
pedia.content:
The Andermani Empire is a multi-system star nation under an imperial government, led by an Emperor.

Although smaller than the [[Solarian League]] or the [[Republic of Haven]], and technologically inferior to Manticore, the Andermani are a formidable presence. In addition to a powerful navy, they possess an excellent intelligence service. Although large parts of the population were of ethnic Chinese descent, their official language is German, and many aspects of their culture are German-influenced as well.

Andermani Empire
Form of Government Monarchy
Official language German
Home Planet Potsdam
Head of State Emperor
Head of Government Chancellor
Executive Branch Imperial Council
Military Imperial Andermani Navy
Imperial Andermani Army
Founded 16th Century PD

pedia.name: BuWeaps
pedia.content: The Bureau of Weapons, or BuWeaps, is a department of the Royal Manticoran Navy that deals with the development of weapons and technology related to strategies and tactics. It is commanded by the Fourth Space Lord.

pedia.name: BuPers
pedia.content:
The Bureau of Personnel, nicknamed BuPers, is a department of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]], commanded by the Fifth Space Lord. It is responsible for the recruiting, training, and assignments of naval personnel. 

One of the positions within BuPers is that of the Recruit Training Syllabus Officer.

pedia.name: Trevor's Star System
pedia.content:
The Trevor's Star System is a star system in the inner influence sphere of the [[Republic of Haven]]. It is the location of the a terminus of the [[Manticore Wormhole Junction]], which was a cause of concern for both Manticore and Haven, and eventualy became part of the Star Kingdom.

Star geography

Trevor's Star is located to the galactic east of the Star Kingdom of Manticore, in the territory of the expanded [[Republic of Haven]]. It is orbited by one inhabited planet named [[San Martin]].

pedia.name: BuShips
pedia.content: The Bureau of Ships, also known as BuShips, is a department of the [[Royal Manticoran Navy]] that deals with the various vessels of the RMN. This includs building, refit, and maintenance of vessels. The bureau falls under the jurisdiction of the Third Space Lord.

pedia.name: Talbott Quadrant Guard
pedia.content: The Quadrant Guard was a local defense force for the [[Talbott Quadrant]] of the [[Star Empire of Manticore]].
